__e: We didn't know it was important, I didn't make the link.
We all knew that it was a gamble and I just... well, I just lost, that's all.
Everyone said it was his heart but I think we all knew that was a lie.
I think we established there's a lot you don't know about me.
I think we all realized that this was not the way things were supposed to be.
Come on. Tell us how we know you weren't with her in the room?
Sorry, we didn't know anyone was around. You sure you're all right?
We didn't know that this was your house until, until now, and, and you can have it if-if you'll just let us out of here.
I mean, we knew he could be a wankster to other people, but I didn't know he could be such a wankster to us, which makes a huge difference to me.
Chelsea and I had a long conversation.
She wasn't herself, and we knew that, and then this happens.
If this is your way of saying you're not the killer we already know that.
And we wanted to plan something, what do we do? My God, what do we do? Where do we go?
We didn't know what he was doing until after he did it.
I mean, when this accident happened and none of us knew what to do with you, he's the one that wanted to make you an agent.
And we wanted to plan something, what do we do? My God, what do we do? Where do we go?
I mean, when this accident happened and none of us knew what to do with you, he's the one that wanted to make you an agent.
We didn't know what he was doing until after he did it.
Well, when we made it, we didn't know whether you were coming or going or staying or what, so...
The thing is we had no idea whether he was telling the truth or not.
Well, uh... What I mean, sir, is we didn't know whether you were checking out or not.
We just didn't know how or why.
I couldn't look like we didn't know what we were doing, could I?
Well, if we both knew it, how come I didn't know it? Like I said, if there's anything I can do.
That's, uh, really great. But we actually know all that.
But the other things... The things they say he did to the Jews and the rest, we knew nothing about that.
It's just, you know, why didn't we know about any of you?
